author: wsjcom
title: Rauner Not the Answer to Illinois’s Problems
text:
Regarding James Taranto’s “The Weekend Interview with Bruce Rauner: Bruce Rauner vs. the Illinois ‘Mafia’” (March 3): Here are some things the interview misses about the past three years: Our unfunded pension liabilities—already the worst in the country and rapidly bankrupting us—have grown by an appalling 25%. An enormous backlog of unpaid bills has grown from $6.6 billion to nearly $16 billion. We have lost manufacturing jobs while everyone in our region has enjoyed substantial growth in that sector. Our personal-income growth is the worst in the nation. Our state’s credit has been downgraded eight times.
Gov....
